tools/bb2exo.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Convert bounding box file to exodus dataset.

Source
/home/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/bb2exo.c,v
Revision
1.6
Date
2006/11/07 23:49:03

Description:

Reads a bounding box file (see threshBoundBox.c) and creates a new Exodus dataset with a mesh for each bounding box.

The naming convention of the bb meshes is: name_step#, where the name and step# are the same as the attributes on the bb element. (The step# is appended to help pick bb since the exo file doesn't have time.)

Todo:
Should probably make a version 'bb2fc' where can choose final file type with '-t' like w/ fcconvert.
Modifications:
  • 03/01/2006 WSD, created.
  • 06/29/2006 WSD, converted to new bb file format.

00094   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00095     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00096       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;

00098     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00099       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;

00108   }
00109   if (!bbfile_name)

00112   // init library

00116   fc_exitIfError(rc);

00118   // read the bb file
00119   rc = _fc_readBBFile(bbfile_name, &numBB, &bbNames, &stepIDs, &comments,

00121   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to read bb file '%s'", bbfile_name);
00122   if (numBB < 1) {

00131     fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);

00134 
00135   // create a dataset to put bb meshes into
00136   rc = fc_createDataset("Bounding Boxes", &dataset);
00137   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to create dataset");

00140 
00141   // For each line in bb, create a bbmesh
00142   for (i = 0; i < numBB; i++) {

00144     if (stepIDs[i] < 0)

00147       sprintf(mesh_name_buf, "%s_step%d", bbNames[i], stepIDs[i]);
00148     rc = fc_createBoundingBoxMesh(dataset, mesh_name_buf, 3, lows[i], highs[i],
00149                       &mesh);
00150     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to create bounding box mesh with "
00151                 "([%g,%g,%g],[%g,%g,%g])", lows[i][0], lows[i][1],
00152                 lows[i][2], highs[i][0], highs[i][1], highs[i][2]);
00153     free(bbNames[i]);

00162   // Write the dataset
00163   rc = fc_writeDataset(dataset, exofile_name, FC_FT_EXODUS);
00164   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to write exodus dataset");
00165

00167   fc_finalLibrary();
